verses.verse: לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִרְאֶה֩ <S%H7200><s%> Thou shalt not see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שׁ֨וֹר <S%H7794><s%> ox אָחִ֜יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brother's א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׂיוֹ֙ <S%H7716><s%> or his sheep נִדָּחִ֔ים <S%H5080><s%> go astray וְהִתְעַלַּמְתָּ֖ <S%H5956><s%> and hide מֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> you הָשֵׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> thyself from them thou shalt in any case תְּשִׁיבֵ֖ם <S%H7725><s%> bring them again לְאָחִֽיךָ׃ <S%H251><s%> unto thy brother

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> is not קָר֥וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [be] not nigh אָחִ֛יךָ <S%H251><s%> And if thy brother אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> about וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יְדַעְתּ֑וֹ <S%H3045><s%> unto thee or if thou know וַאֲסַפְתּוֹ֙ <S%H622><s%> him not then thou shalt bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> it unto בֵּיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> thine own house וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall remain עִמְּךָ֗ <S%H5973><s%> you עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> until דְּרֹ֤שׁ <S%H1875><s%> seek אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> and it shall be with thee until thy brother אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַהֲשֵׁבֹת֖וֹ <S%H7725><s%> after it and thou shalt restore it to him again לֽוֹ׃

וְכֵ֧ן <S%H3651><s%> In like manner תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou do לַחֲמֹר֗וֹ <S%H2543><s%> with his ass וְכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> the same תַּעֲשֶׂה֮ <S%H6213><s%> and so shalt thou do לְשִׂמְלָתוֹ֒ <S%H8071><s%> with his raiment וְכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> likewise תַּעֲשֶׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou do לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> anything אֲבֵדַ֥ת <S%H9><s%> and with all lost thing אָחִ֛יךָ <S%H251><s%> of thy brother's אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which תֹּאבַ֥ד <S%H6><s%> which he hath lost מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> and you וּמְצָאתָ֑הּ <S%H4672><s%> and thou hast found לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> are not תוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> likewise thou mayest לְהִתְעַלֵּֽם׃ <S%H5956><s%> not hide ס

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִרְאֶה֩ <S%H7200><s%> Thou shalt not see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמ֨וֹר <S%H2543><s%> ass אָחִ֜יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brother's א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> or שׁוֹרוֹ֙ <S%H7794><s%> or his ox נֹפְלִ֣ים <S%H5307><s%> fall down בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way וְהִתְעַלַּמְתָּ֖ <S%H5956><s%> and hide מֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> you הָקֵ֥ם <S%H6965><s%> thyself from them thou shalt surely תָּקִ֖ים <S%H6965><s%> help him to lift [them] up again עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with ס

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> wear כְלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> shall not wear that which pertaineth גֶ֙בֶר֙ <S%H1397><s%> unto a man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> The woman וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִלְבַּ֥שׁ <S%H3847><s%> put גֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1397><s%> neither shall a man שִׂמְלַ֣ת <S%H8071><s%> garment אִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> on a woman's כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for תוֹעֲבַ֛ת <S%H8441><s%> [are] abomination יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever עֹ֥שֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> for all that do אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> so פ

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> If יִקָּרֵ֣א <S%H7122><s%> chance קַן־ <S%H7064><s%> nest צִפּ֣וֹר ׀ <S%H6833><s%> If a bird's לְפָנֶ֡יךָ <S%H6440><s%> to be before בַּדֶּ֜רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> thee in the way בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any עֵ֣ץ ׀ <S%H6086><s%> in any tree א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> or on the ground אֶפְרֹחִים֙ <S%H667><s%> [whether they be] young ones א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בֵיצִ֔ים <S%H1000><s%> or eggs וְהָאֵ֤ם <S%H517><s%> and the dam רֹבֶ֙צֶת֙ <S%H7257><s%> sitting עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָֽאֶפְרֹחִ֔ים <S%H667><s%> upon the young א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַבֵּיצִ֑ים <S%H1000><s%> or upon the eggs לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> thou shalt not take הָאֵ֖ם <S%H517><s%> the dam עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with הַבָּנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> with the young

שַׁלֵּ֤חַ <S%H7971><s%> [But] thou shalt in any wise תְּשַׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵ֔ם <S%H517><s%> let the dam וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> the young תִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> and take לָ֑ךְ לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> order יִ֣יטַב <S%H3190><s%> to thee that it may be well לָ֔ךְ וְהַאֲרַכְתָּ֖ <S%H748><s%> with thee and [that] thou mayest prolong יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> [thy] days ס

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When תִבְנֶה֙ <S%H1129><s%> When thou buildest בַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> house חָדָ֔שׁ <S%H2319><s%> a new וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> then thou shalt make מַעֲקֶ֖ה <S%H4624><s%> a battlement לְגַגֶּ֑ךָ <S%H1406><s%> for thy roof וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> you will not תָשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> that thou bring דָּמִים֙ <S%H1818><s%> not blood בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> upon thine house כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if יִפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> if any man הַנֹּפֵ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> fall מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at ס

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִזְרַ֥ע <S%H2232><s%> Thou shalt not sow כַּרְמְךָ֖ <S%H3754><s%> thy vineyard כִּלְאָ֑יִם <S%H3610><s%> with divers seeds פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or תִּקְדַּ֗שׁ <S%H6942><s%> be defiled הַֽמְלֵאָ֤ה <S%H4395><s%> lest the fruit הַזֶּ֙רַע֙ <S%H2233><s%> of thy seed אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּזְרָ֔ע <S%H2232><s%> which thou hast sown וּתְבוּאַ֖ת <S%H8393><s%> and the fruit הַכָּֽרֶם׃ <S%H3754><s%> of thy vineyard ס
לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַחֲרֹ֥שׁ <S%H2790><s%> Thou shalt not plow בְּשׁוֹר־ <S%H7794><s%> with an ox וּבַחֲמֹ֖ר <S%H2543><s%> and an ass יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> together ס

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִלְבַּשׁ֙ <S%H3847><s%> Thou shalt not wear שַֽׁעַטְנֵ֔ז <S%H8162><s%> a garment of divers sorts צֶ֥מֶר <S%H6785><s%> [as] of woollen וּפִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6593><s%> and linen יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> together ס

גְּדִלִ֖ים <S%H1434><s%> thee fringes תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> Thou shalt make לָּ֑ךְ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַרְבַּ֛ע <S%H702><s%> upon the four כַּנְפ֥וֹת <S%H3671><s%> quarters כְּסוּתְךָ֖ <S%H3682><s%> of thy vesture אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which תְּכַסֶּה־ <S%H3680><s%> wherewith thou coverest בָּֽהּ׃ ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> take אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If any man אִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> a wife וּבָ֥א <S%H935><s%> and go in אֵלֶ֖יהָ <S%H413><s%> about וּשְׂנֵאָֽהּ׃ <S%H8130><s%> unto her and hate

וְשָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> And give לָהּ֙ עֲלִילֹ֣ת <S%H5949><s%> occasions דְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> of speech וְהוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> against her and bring up עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> an evil וְאָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> upon her and say אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> this woman הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> I לָקַ֔חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> I took וָאֶקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> and when I came אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> about וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not מָצָ֥אתִי <S%H4672><s%> to her I found לָ֖הּ בְּתוּלִֽים׃ <S%H1331><s%> her not a maid

וְלָקַ֛ח <S%H3947><s%> take אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> Then shall the father [הַנַּעַר כ] (הַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <S%H5291><s%> damsel ק) וְאִמָּ֑הּ <S%H517><s%> and her mother וְהוֹצִ֜יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> and bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּתוּלֵ֧י <S%H1331><s%> virginity [הַנַּעַר כ] (הַֽנַּעֲרָ֛ה <S%H5291><s%> damsel ק) אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> unto the elders הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city הַשָּֽׁעְרָה׃ <S%H8179><s%> in the gate

וְאָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> shall say אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> father [הַנַּעַר כ] (הַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <S%H5291><s%> damsel ק) אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַזְּקֵנִ֑ים <S%H2205><s%> unto the elders אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּתִּ֗י <S%H1323><s%> my daughter נָתַ֜תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I gave לָאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto this man הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> to this לְאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> to wife וַיִּשְׂנָאֶֽהָ׃ <S%H8130><s%> and he hateth

וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold ה֡וּא <S%H1931><s%> he שָׂם֩ <S%H7760><s%> And lo he hath given עֲלִילֹ֨ת <S%H5949><s%> occasions דְּבָרִ֜ים <S%H1697><s%> of speech לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> [against her] saying לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not מָצָ֤אתִי <S%H4672><s%> I found לְבִתְּךָ֙ <S%H1323><s%> not thy daughter בְּתוּלִ֔ים <S%H1331><s%> a maid וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> this בְּתוּלֵ֣י <S%H1331><s%> virginity בִתִּ֑י <S%H1323><s%> and yet these [are the tokens of] my daughter's וּפָֽרְשׂוּ֙ <S%H6566><s%> And they shall spread הַשִּׂמְלָ֔ה <S%H8071><s%> the cloth לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before זִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> the elders הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> of the city

וְלָֽקְח֛וּ <S%H3947><s%> shall take זִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> And the elders הָֽעִיר־ <S%H5892><s%> of that city הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that man וְיִסְּר֖וּ <S%H3256><s%> and chastise אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְעָנְשׁ֨וּ <S%H6064><s%> And they shall amerce אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> מֵ֣אָה <S%H3967><s%> him in an hundred כֶ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [shekels] of silver וְנָתְנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> and give לַאֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> [them] unto the father הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ה <S%H5291><s%> of the damsel כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because הוֹצִיא֙ <S%H3318><s%> because he hath brought up שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name רָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> an evil עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and בְּתוּלַ֣ת <S%H1330><s%> upon a virgin יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלֽוֹ־ תִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall remain לְאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> and she shall be his wife לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> he may לְשַׁלְּחָ֖הּ <S%H7971><s%> not put her away כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> her all יָמָֽיו׃ <S%H3117><s%> all his days ס

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אֱמֶ֣ת <S%H571><s%> be true הָיָ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> But if this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> was not נִמְצְא֥וּ <S%H4672><s%> be not found בְתוּלִ֖ים <S%H1331><s%> [and the tokens of] virginity [לַנַּעַר כ] (לַֽנַּעֲרָֽה׃ <S%H5291><s%> damsel ק)

וְהוֹצִ֨יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> Then they shall bring out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [הַנַּעַר כ] (הַֽנַּעֲרָ֜ה <S%H5291><s%> damsel ק) אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> to the door בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֗יהָ <S%H1><s%> of her father's וּסְקָלוּהָ֩ <S%H5619><s%> shall stone אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> and the men עִירָ֤הּ <S%H5892><s%> of her city בָּאֲבָנִים֙ <S%H68><s%> her with stones וָמֵ֔תָה <S%H4191><s%> that she die כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because עָשְׂתָ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> because she hath wrought נְבָלָה֙ <S%H5039><s%> folly בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel לִזְנ֖וֹת <S%H2181><s%> to play the whore בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֑יהָ <S%H1><s%> in her father's וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <S%H1197><s%> away הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> from among ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִמָּצֵ֨א <S%H4672><s%> be found אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If a man שֹׁכֵ֣ב ׀ <S%H7901><s%> lying עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> with a woman בְעֻֽלַת־ <S%H1166><s%> married בַּ֗עַל <S%H1167><s%> to an husband וּמֵ֙תוּ֙ <S%H4191><s%> die גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> shall both שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8147><s%> then they shall both of them הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [both] the man הַשֹּׁכֵ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> that lay עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> with the woman וְהָאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> and the woman וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <S%H1197><s%> so shalt thou put away הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> from Israel ס
